about_the_game:
Game Introduction

Welcome to 2028, where science bridges the human world and demon realm!
Step into the shoes of 'Jun-Yeop', a struggling singer-songwriter thrust into the heart-pounding world of death metal.
After a crushing audition defeat, Jun-Yeop's fate takes an explosive turn when a mysterious record label president scouts him.
Prepare for a pulse-racing journey as Jun-Yeop joins a death metal band, crossing paths with unforgettable characters:

'Botzzi' - A prodigy bassist with fingers that ignite the strings
'NoonNa' - A demon vocalist whose voice can shatter dimensions

But this is more than just a music adventure. It's a choice-driven odyssey where your decisions shape Jun-Yeop's destiny. Will you guide him to rock stardom, otherworldly romance, or something beyond imagination?
Key Features:

Stunning visuals that bring the human and demon worlds to life
A branching narrative with multiple endings – every choice matters!
Original soundtrack featuring pulse-pounding death metal tracks
Deep character development and unexpected plot twists
Unique blend of music, romance, and supernatural elements

Experience laughter, tears, fury, and passion in this groundbreaking visual novel. Your journey through 'Noonna The Rock' will challenge your mind, test your heart, and leave you craving for more.

Are you ready to rock the human world, conquer the demon realm, and perhaps find love along the way? Your epic saga awaits in 'Noonna The Rock' – where music transcends dimensions!

content_descriptors.notes:
18+ only. Contains:

Strong language
Sexual content
Suicide themes
BDSM depictions
Incest references (non-interactive)

All characters are adults. Incest-related options trigger error messages only.

Game Introduction

Welcome to 2028, where science bridges the human world and demon realm!
Step into the shoes of 'Jun-Yeop', a struggling singer-songwriter thrust into the heart-pounding world of death metal.
After a crushing audition defeat, Jun-Yeop's fate takes an explosive turn when a mysterious record label president scouts him.
Prepare for a pulse-racing journey as Jun-Yeop joins a death metal band, crossing paths with unforgettable characters:

Experience laughter, tears, fury, and passion in this groundbreaking visual novel. Your journey through 'Noonna The Rock' will challenge your mind, test your heart, and leave you craving for more.

name: Noonna The Rock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a music-driven adventure across dimensions in this choice-based death metal visual novel. Lead your band between the human and demon realms, experience romance, and make destiny-altering decisions. Stunning graphics and an death metal soundtrack will amplify your thrilling journey.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
